metadata.name: BuiltInD6
metadata.description:
This mod gives you a built-in D6 ability, in addition to your active item slot. The default key to activate this ability is 'T'. If you want to change it, use the custom challenge called "Change Keybind For Built-In D6."
The built-in D6 charges when you clear rooms, can't be dropped, and can't be charged by battery pickups.
